ingredients.ingredient: 2 sweet onions (such as Vidalia®), thinly sliced
1 pinch paprika, or more to taste

cookingTips: Caramelize the onions slowly over medium heat until golden and sweet, about 20-25 minutes
Fold in shredded cheese slowly to prevent lumps and ensure smooth consistency
Keep dip warm in a slow cooker or baking dish at 325°F for serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does slowly caramelizing the onions add depth and sweetness to this cheese dip?
